item.description:
From June to September, celebrate Nights on the Neck on the first Thursday of the month from 5:30 to 9pm. Many galleries host receptions with refreshments. Musicians, dancers, authors, historians and other entertainers give performances and lectures.

I've done this several times, and it's always been a great night out. We can walk the neck, visit the open galleries, listen to music, and end up at one of the restaurants for drinks & / food. This is a combined event with other meetup groups.

*WE WILL MEETUP @ 5pm at The Rocky Neck Art Colony sign- the sign is at the public lot at the base of Rocky Neck Avenue. If you are unable to join us at 5, join us when you can. My contact # is: 978.289.7679. This is a mostly outdoor event - therefore, weather dependant. Please make sure to check for an update if weather is questionable.


**You can find July 5th schedule at: www.rockyneckartcolony.org
7/5/12: Events begin at 5pm just across from the public parking lot - Mamadou is scheduled from 5pm-6pm. The last event scheduled is from 8:45- 9:30 - Jazz at The Center, on 6 Wonson St
item.name: Nites On The Neck- Rocky Neck Art Colony- Gloucester
